summary: This mod makes it so your armored troll followers survive in battle better.
descriptionHtml:
Mod:  Tougher Armored Trolls  1_0
Game:  TES V: Skyrim
Requires:  Dawnguard
Author:  David Brasher             
Date:  9/22/12                   
************************************************************************
CONTENTS                          
************************************************************************
1. Information on the Mod
2. Installation
3. Version History
4. Conflicts, Known Issues, and Troubleshooting
5. Copy Status and Credits
************************************************************************
1. INFORMATION ON THE MOD           
************************************************************************
	   This mod makes it so your armored troll followers survive in battle better.

	   The mod comes in two versions: 
(1)  Armored troll followers are protected so that they go into bleedout mode and will not usually die.  
(2)  Armored troll followers may be killed, but they have 3000 health so that they can survive battles 
     of moderate intensity.     
************************************************************************
2. Installation                           
************************************************************************	   
           To install this mod, extract (decompress) the .esp to your Skyrim directory.  
(It will be something like *Installation directory*\\Skyrim\\SteamApps\\common\\Skyrim\\Data)
Mark the box next to the mod in your mod manager.
 
           Alternately, extract someplace else.  Then move the .esp to Skyrim\\Data.  Mark the box 
next to the mod in your mod manager.
************************************************************************
3. Version History    
************************************************************************
V 1.0  9/22/12   Initial release.   
************************************************************************
4. Conflicts, Known Issues, and Troubleshooting
************************************************************************
	   You can\'t play this mod unless you have Dawnguard.

	   This mod will change game balance and perhaps make it too easy for you if you use armored
troll followers.

	   This mod will conflict with other mods that edit armored trolls.

	   I don\'t think you will want to use this mod if you play as a vampire and will have to fight 
against the Dawnguard\'s armored trolls.	   
	
	   If you locate a bug, contact David Brasher on Skyrim Nexus so that the situation can be
examined and can hopefully be fixed. 
************************************************************************
5. Copy Status and Credits           
************************************************************************
Credits:  LordSarcasm for mod concept.

	  Bethesda for making Skyrim and Dawnguard in an open format anyone can mod.
		
Copy Status:  Public domain with proper attribution and courtesy notification.  You may use things
	  from this mod in your own mods and distribute them so long as you list me in your credits and
	  notify me that you have used the mod content.         
************************************************************************
************************************************************************
************************************************************************
************************************************************************
